resources.string: What is Jazz Discount Bazar Service all about?

Jazz Discount Bazar is an SMS and Mobile Application based service which provides a platform to view best Deals & Discounts on Top Brands in Pakistan. With major brands on-board ranging from fashion & lifestyle to health & fitness, Shopping, Restaurants and much more, Discount Bazar has it All!\nJazz Discount Bazar also offers a variety of Exclusive Deals available to Discount Bazar users only who can later avail them from the respective stores/outlets via discount redemption process.
What do I get from Jazz Discount Bazar?

Jazz Discount Bazar users get Exclusive Deals & Discounts along with latest updates of the related categories. The user can also search any business of their liking and get the contact details. The categories for which deals & updates are offered are as follows: 
		1. Top Deals 
		2. Food Deals 
		3. Shopping and Fashion 
		4. Ladies Section 
		5. Health and Fitness 
		6. Education 
		7. Entertainment
How can a user subscribe to Jazz Discount Bazar?
User can subscribe to Jazz Discount Bazar via either of the two mediums:

1. SMS: User must send “SUB” to 5005. Once sent, the user will get a message confirming successful subscription. User will be charged Rs. 0.50+tax/Week as subscription price. However, if the user has already subscribed to the service through Smartphone Application, he will not be charged again.

2. Smart Phone Application: 
		i. User downloads the Jazz Discount Bazar smartphone application from Jazz App Store. 
		ii. User enters his Jazz Mobile Number to login. 
		iii. On successful login, he becomes the subscriber and is charged Rs. 2.5 + tax/Week for the service. 
	iv. However, in case the user has already subscribed to the service through SMS, he will not be charged again.
What are the Smartphone Application Charges?
Upon successful application installation & login, the user will be charged are Rs. 2.5+tax/Week. However, the user is not charged on downloading the smartphone application.
How can a User Redeem Exclusive Deals?
The User can redeem the deal through following steps:
Step 1: User views the deal on APP. \nStep 2: User will have to click on Redeem Deal Button. (Only for Exclusive Deals) \nStep 3: User will have to enter merchant code.
i. Merchant can enter the code for User on their mobile. \nii. Merchant can share the code with User. \niii. Merchant codes will be put on display in their shops and User can enter it himself.
How can a user Unsubscribe from this service?

User can deactivate the service by simply clicking on ‘Unsubscribe’ button from Main Menu given on the home screen. Once done, the user will have to login again if he wishes to use the smartphone application.
Please enter a valid Mobilink Mobile Number

"Hi, I just found this great App for you called Jazz Discount Bazar. You can find businesses and " + "enjoy Premium Discounts of your favorite Top Brands. Simply download the Application " + "from PlayStore & avail the Best Deals in your city!

By unsubscribing Jazz Discount Bazar, you will no longer get promotion or service alerts from application.
